text: "Marge Gets a Job" is the 7th episode of the 4th season of The Simpsons. It was first shown on television on November 5, 1992. In the episode, Marge gets a job at the power plant where Homer works at. Mr. Burns (the boss of the power plant) starts to love Marge and tries to make a relationship with her. While this happens, Bart tries to get out of taking a test at school in an allusion of The Boy Who Cried Wolf. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:The Simpsons (season 4) episodes Category:1992 television episodes
